unnormalised: EV Charging Scene Heating Up, Yaar!
normalised: E V Charging Scene Heating Up, Yaar!

unnormalised: The EV revolution is buzzing, and guess what? Charging infrastructure is finally catching up! No more range anxiety on your Mumbai-Pune trips, hopefully.
normalised: The E V revolution is buzzing, and guess what? Charging infrastructure is finally catching up! No more range anxiety on your Mumbai-Pune trips, hopefully.

unnormalised: IIT Bombay just announced a breakthrough in fast charging tech, promising juiced-up batteries in, like, minutes. Imagine reaching Lonavala and being ready to roll again before you can finish your vada pav!
normalised: I I T Bombay just announced a breakthrough in fast charging tech, promising juiced-up batteries in, like, minutes. Imagine reaching Lonavala and being ready to roll again before you can finish your vada pav!

unnormalised: Plus, more and more charging stations are popping up at Bharat Petroleum and Indian Oil petrol pumps – total game changer! Even your friendly neighbourhood Kirana store might soon have a charging point (okay, maybe not *yet*).
normalised: Plus, more and more charging stations are popping up at Bharat Petroleum and Indian Oil petrol pumps – total game changer! Even your friendly neighbourhood Kirana store might soon have a charging point (okay, maybe not *yet*).

unnormalised: Remember the movie "Dilwale Dulhania Le Jayenge?" Imagine Raj having to stop in a field in Punjab to charge his EV... drama! Thankfully, that future is looking less likely.
normalised: Remember the movie "Dilwale Dulhania Le Jayenge?" Imagine Raj having to stop in a field in Punjab to charge his E V... drama! Thankfully, that future is looking less likely.

unnormalised: The government is throwing serious Rs. at boosting charging infrastructure, aiming for charging stations every 50 km on highways.
normalised: The government is throwing serious rupees at boosting charging infrastructure, aiming for charging stations every fifty kilometer on highways.

unnormalised: Companies like Tata Power and Ather Energy are also installing public charging points like crazy.
normalised: Companies like Tata Power and Ather Energy are also installing public charging points like crazy.

unnormalised: We might even see wireless charging soon, imagine just parking your EV and it starts charging automatically. Total SRK vibes! Now, that's a "baazigar" move.
normalised: We might even see wireless charging soon, imagine just parking your E V and it starts charging automatically. Total S R K vibes! Now, that's a "baazigar" move.
